channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 16 Best Heat Protectant Sprays for Wet and Dry Hair (2026)
item.description: I've spent almost a year testing dozens of heat protectants for hair. Whether you’re blow-drying, curling, or straightening, these are the best formulas I've found.

item.title: Le nouveau Honor Magic 8 Lite, un smartphone ultra-résistant (IP69) et inépuisable (7 500 mAh), est déjà dans un pack à prix cassé lors des soldes
item.description: Avec d'un côté un smartphone doté d'une autonomie de trois jours et de l'autre des écouteurs qui tiennent neuf heures, ce pack disponible pour 399,99 euros chez Boulanger a tout pour séduire ceux qui ont peur de tomber à court de batterie.

item.title: Bluesound Pulse Cinema Review: A Pretty Sonos Alternative
item.description: This is a promising stand-alone Dolby Atmos soundbar for music fans, but it still needs a few software tweaks.

item.title: Emily in Paris season 6: everything we know about the hit Netflix show's return
item.description: Netflix has officially renewed Emily in Paris season 6 — here's everything we know so far about the next installment.

item.title: Verizon's incredible New Year deals offer up to four iPhone 17 Pros for free - but for how much longer?
item.description: Don't miss your chance to score last year's best Verizon iPhone deals before they expire for good.

item.title: Sony A7V Review: The Best Overall Mirrorless Camera
item.description: Sony’s latest full frame mirrorless is a hybrid powerhouse with features to impress both video and still photographers.

item.title: I tested WiiM’s Wi-Fi speaker against the Sonos Era 100 – here’s which I think is worth buying
item.description: I tested the WiiM Sound and Sonos Era 100 side by side to see which offers the best sound.

item.title: Chargeurs IKEA pas chers, lunettes avec correction adaptative, Microsoft Office disparaît – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Quelles ont été les actualités technologiques les plus marquantes de la semaine ? À l’occasion du CES 2026, les annonces ont été multiples dans tous les secteurs : recharge, objets connectés, ordinateur. C'est le récap' de la semaine !

item.title: Want to Stop Doomscrolling? You Might Need a Sleep Coach
item.description: Traditionally sleep coaches treat babies. But now more and more anxious, screen-attached grownups are the ones who need nursing.

item.title: What is the release date for The Boyfriend season 2 episodes 1-6 on Netflix?
item.description: It's been a whole year since Netflix's surprise dating show hit first aired, and now it's back. But when do the first batch of The Boyfriend season 2 episodes drop?
